Class TableArea

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.area.TableArea
public class TableArea extends Object
Class to represent any type of Mode table in UI consisting of Cells

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    TableArea(int columns, int rows)
    Constructs a new TableArea without Cells
